```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(GEOquery)
library(Biobase)
```

```{r}
i=704439
n=704465
while (i < n) {
  data <- getGEO(paste0('GSM',i))
  write.csv(as.data.frame(data@dataTable@table),file = paste0('GSM',i,'.csv'))
  i = i+1
}


```
